etomica.modules.statistics

Class HistoryStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.history.HistoryScrolling
      • etomica.modules.statistics.HistoryStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    History, java.io.Serializable

    public class HistoryStatistics
extends HistoryScrolling
    History that records a number of values, with new ones replacing the earliest ones when the record is full. The data returned by the getHistory method will have the earliest first in the array, and the most recent last. If presented as a plot, the effect will be to scroll the data across the plot window.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
